sentences.en: A a nucleotide derived from adenosine that occurs in muscle tissue; the major source of energy for cellular reactions.
sentences.cn: 肌肉细胞中由腺苷衍生而来的核苷酸，细胞反应的主要能源。

sentences.en: A nucleotide molecule that consists of a combination of two nucleotide units.
sentences.cn: 二核苷酸：两个单核苷酸结合而成的核苷酸分子。

sentences.en: A SNP is a variation in just one nucleotide of a genetic sequence; think of it as a spelling change affecting just one letter in an uncommonly long word.
sentences.cn: 一个SNP就是只在一个基因序列的一个核苷酸中发生的变异；就像一个拼写变化只影响一个罕见的长单词中的一个字母。

sentences.en: But such single - nucleotide polymorphism ( SNP ) profiles can be deceptive, Duster warns.
sentences.cn: 但达斯特提出警告,这种[单核苷酸多型性]的剖析可能会有错误.

sentences.en: Conclusion: interferon, thymosin and new nucleotide similitude are efficacious medicines.
sentences.cn: 胸腺肽及核苷酸类似物如拉米呋定、法昔洛韦等.

sentences.en: Direct Inhibition of Cardiac Hyperpolarization - Actiated Cyclic Nucleotide – Gated Pacemaker Channels by Clonidine.
sentences.cn: 可乐定对超极化激活环核苷酸门控通道的直接抑制作用.

sentences.en: Hepatology Digest: For nucleotide analogues, drug resistance is an inevitable problem.
sentences.cn: 《国际肝病》: 对于核苷(酸)类似物来说, 出现耐药是不可避免的问题.

sentences.en: In non - coding region It'shows mutation of single nucleotide deletion or substitution.
sentences.cn: 非编码区亦存在单个碱基缺失及置换突变.

sentences.en: In the genetic code that life has used up to now, there are 64 possible triplet combinations of the four nucleotide letters; these genetic "words" are called codons.
sentences.cn: 从生命开始使用遗传密码到现在，核苷酸的四个字母的三重组合有64个可能，这些遗传“字词”被称为密码子。

sentences.en: It also carries a specific nucleotide sequence, the anticodon.
sentences.cn: 它还带有特定的核苷酸序列即反密码子.

sentences.en: It is the particular sequence of the nucleotide blocks along the molecule that encodes the genetic information .
sentences.cn: 沿着分子核苷酸的特定序列为遗传信息编码。

sentences.en: Nucleotide sequences homologous to oncornaviruses DNA products have been observed in human leukaemic cells.
sentences.cn: 在人白血病细胞中,已经观察到与肿瘤毒病DNA产物相同的核苷酸序列.

sentences.en: Nucleotide takes part in the synthesis, and metabolism of genetic materials.
sentences.cn: 核苷酸可参与遗传物质的合成与代谢.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To introduce the research progress of the antivirus agents nucleotide.
sentences.cn: 目的: 介绍核苷类抗病毒药物的研究进展.

sentences.en: Software solution that provides a visual interface to nucleotide mutations.
sentences.cn: 为核甘酸突变提供视觉介面的软件解决方案.

sentences.en: The application progress on mass spectrometric analysis of nucleotide has been reviewed.
sentences.cn: 综述生物质谱用于分析核糖核酸的应用进展.

sentences.en: The breakthrough permits direct detection of each nucleotide, allowing an entire gene to be sequenced in about an hour.
sentences.cn: 这个重大的突破允许直接检测每个核苷酸，可以在大约一小时之内测序整个基因。

sentences.en: The holoenzyme recognizes specific nucleotide sequences on the DNA duplex ( promoters ).
sentences.cn: 全酶还能识别DNA双链分子上的特定核苷酸序列 ( 起动基因 ).

sentences.en: The nucleotide contents in erythrocytes of 8 diabetics were determined by HPLC.
sentences.cn: 本文采用HPLC法测定了8例糖尿病患者红细胞的核苷酸含量.

sentences.en: The specific antigen of autoantibody might be human myocardium adenine nucleotide translocator.
sentences.cn: 该抗体的特异性抗原可能为人心肌线粒体腺苷酸转位酶.

sentences.en: Thymine or thymine nucleotide concentration was all disqulified.
sentences.cn: 胸腺嘧啶或胸腺嘧啶核苷均不合格.

phrases.tran_cn: 核苷酸序列；核酸序列；核苷酸顺序

trans.tran_en: a compound consisting of a nucleoside linked to phosphoric acid
